inclusion.criterion: Standard tocometer used on Labor and Delivery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Monitor belt secured by CTU staff
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fetal Life tocometer paired with study iPad
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: CTU staff document patient's age, parity, estimated gestational age and body mass index
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient had a severe 'exploding' headache after hitting her head on a cabinet, and was diagnosed with an AVM. She refused PT evaluation but was ambulating independently without difficulty.
